Text: Power World Updatesmith PST When Monday November PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where Dougs desk

Re Storage Meeting Cc Rex I believe there might be a few additions to this core group I have spoken with Sherron Watkins and she is handling the storage side of the deal from product development perspective John Bloomers team and so she would need to be a part of this core group I am trying to determine who else is involved with Storage within EBS so that we dont replicate our efforts I am hoping that after tomorrows meeting we will have a better picture of how to go forward on this project Please let me know if you need any further information regarding this project Thank you very much for your interest and I look forward to meeting you in the near future Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo on PM To cc Subject Re Storage Meeting Shalesh Mark Thanks for pulling this together Is the core team Mark Mary Kara Mike Virawan and Shalesh I know that there is a lot of interest in this topic but you folks will need to carefully control the noise level from all the input Let me know how I can help Best regards Rex on PM To Mark S PalmerEnron nron Communications Jim CrowderEnron nron Communications Jean MrhaEnron nron Communications Kara KnopEnron nron Communications David CoxEnron nron Communications John BloomerEnron nron Communications John GrieblingEnron nron Communications Richard ReichardtEnron nron Communications Scott YeagerEnron nron Communications David BerberianEnron nron Communications Rex ShelbyEnron nron Communications Mike HaneyEnron nron Communications Ravi ThuraisinghamEnron nron Communications cc Subject Re Storage Meeting Ladies and Gentlemen Stinson just pointed out that I forgot to mention that the meeting is scheduled for tomorrow th of March between PM and PM It may seem like a very short notice however we Mark Mary Kara Mike Virawan and myself had initially set this time and date last week In the future I will make sure that everyone is notified early Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo

Re Storage Meetingand Gentlemen Stinson just pointed out that I forgot to mention that the meeting is scheduled for tomorrow th of March between PM and PM It may seem like a very short notice however we Mark Mary Kara Mike Virawan and myself had initially set this time and date last week In the future I will make sure that everyone is notified early Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo

Storage Meetingand Gentlemen Due to unavailability of conference rooms on the th floor I have reserved a conference room on the th floor from PM to PM The room number is C I realize some people might not be able to attend so please let me know and I will email you a summary of the discussions after the meeting I would also like to suggest that we make this a regularly scheduled meeting and have it biweekly or monthly This will allow everyone to share their opinions and knowledge to direct or redirect our efforts based on the market situation Please let me know if you have any comments or suggestions Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo
CongratulationsCongratulations I wish you the best of luck with your new responsibilities Shalesh Ganjoo

Re Trading Ag Prods Cc Just wanted to let you know that I have done some preliminary high level research into this commodity and would be glad to share it Please let me know if you would be interested in it Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo Vince J CT AM To Shalesh GanjooEnron NRON NRON cc Elsa nron Subject Re Trading Ag Prods Shalesh A good idea I shall forward it to the AG traders Vince From Shalesh NRON COMMUNICATIONS on AM To Nelson NRON cc Vince J CT Subject Trading Ag Prods Nelson I know you are focusing on agricultural products for trading so I just wanted to know if we are looking at Wool I know that its traded in Australia and New Zealand so we might be able to look into it as well Please let me know Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo

Re Information Cc After checking into this issue I have found that the type of information requested is proprietary and not available for release I will try to contact them and see if there is something else we can help them with but as far as the data is concerned I dont believe we can help them with that request I am sorry I couldnt be of more help Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo Vince J Kaminski AM To Shalesh CT cc Vince J CT Stinson CT Subject Information Shalesh Please look into it Can we give them this information I see a remote possibility of a gain for Enron its in our interest to support the growth of this market and part of the process is development of the infrastructure for this market and maintaining public interest Vince Forwarded by Vince J KaminskiHOUECT on AM yann dHalluin on PM To cc Subject Information Dear Sir The Scientific computation group at the University of Waterloo Ontario Canada has recently started to be very interested in the recent developments of the bandwidth market We find that the specifics of the bandwidth market offer challenges from the modelling point of view However we have encountered difficulties when looking for data and we were wondering if you could help us Specifically we would like to know for a given city pair for the different existing type of lines eg OC OC OC What has been the spot lease prices eg linetypemile for the past months What is the price of the dark fiber for a given type of line What is the maintenance cost month for the same lines eg OC OC OC What is the upgrading cost for the different lines eg how much does it cost to upgrade OC OC OC OC OC OC How long does it take to upgrade a line from a certain capacity to another eg month month We realize that some of these questions may ask for confidential data in that case we would really appreciate if an order of magnitude was provided I look forward to hearing from you Sincerely Yann dHalluin PS Here is a link to our web page This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed Any unauthorized review use disclosure or distribution is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message

Thank youDear Vince I would like to thank you for your help and support during this particularly difficult time for me I truly appreciate it Thank you Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo

sganjooresumepst Dear Vince As per our conversation I am attaching my resume and the job description below Please feel free to critique and give me some feedback on my resume I will appreciate it immensely Once again I want to thank you for all the help and assistance you have given me over the last two years I am convinced that I couldnt have asked for or gotten a better boss than you It has truly been a pleasure and an honor to work for you Thank you for the opportunity Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo

Data Storage Trading Cc Richard As per my conversation with Jeff Skilling last week in which he suggested that I contact you I would like to request the names of the companies who we outsource some of our accounting needs to I would like to target them for our latest product Data Storage Capacity Please let me know how you would like me to proceed regarding this matter Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo Senior Analyst Cell

Data Storage TradingMr Skilling I would like to begin by stating that I love working for Enron and would never even dream of working for any other company However after reading an announcement made about the storage trading initiative on the Bloomberg website I was a little disturbed This is an idea I have been trying to forward since October and presented it to Mr David Cox EBS back in November or December Mr Cox liked the idea and pulled me from Enron Glob al Technology to Enron Corporate Reserach under Mr Kaminski as an Analyst to help with other EBS initiatives while I developed this idea Unfortunately no one seemed to be interested in pursuing this opportunity till now however it seems to me that we are now interested in pursuing th is and therefore I would like to ask that I be given an opportunity to fully pursue and develop it I am attaching a small presentation that I had developed to present to Mr Dimicheles group In this presentation you will see that I am not only looking at storage as a traded commodity but several other features of the Internet that will be traded in the future The reas on I am bothering you with this is because I only saw your name mentioned in t he Bloomberg report Please let me know how you would like me to proceed with this Please consider this email confidential Thank you url for the Bloomberg report fgcgicgisDAOTwJSRNRWybgTDmarketsquote news ht Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo Research Analyst Enron Corporate Research cell

Data Storage TradingMr Skilling I would like to begin by stating that I love working for Enron and would never even dream of working for any other company However after reading an announcement made about the storage trading initiative on the Bloomberg website I was a little disturbed This is an idea I have been trying to forward since October and presented it to Mr David Cox EBS back in November or December Mr Cox liked the idea and pulled me from Enron Glob al Technology to Enron Corporate Reserach under Mr Kaminski as an Analyst to help with other EBS initiatives while I developed this idea Unfortunately no one seemed to be interested in pursuing this opportunity till now however it seems to me that we are now interested in pursuing th is and therefore I would like to ask that I be given an opportunity to fully pursue and develop it I am attaching a small presentation that I had developed to present to Mr Dimicheles group In this presentation you will see that I am not only looking at storage as a traded commodity but several other features of the Internet that will be traded in the future The reas on I am bothering you with this is because I only saw your name mentioned in t he Bloomberg report Please let me know how you would like me to proceed with this Please consider this email confidential Thank you url for the Bloomberg report fgcgicgisDAOTwJSRNRWybgTDmarketsquote news ht Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo Research Analyst Enron Corporate Research cell

Data Storage Trading Cc Richard As per my conversation with Jeff Skilling last week in which he suggested that I contact you I would like to request the names of the companies who we outsource some of our accounting needs to I would like to target them for our latest product Data Storage Capacity Please let me know how you would like me to proceed regarding this matter Thank you Shalesh Ganjoo Senior Analyst Cell

Thank youJeff Just wanted to thank you for affording me the opportunity to travel with you last week It was truly educational as well as inspirational to hear you address people at Harvard and NYU I believe that just by your presence our University sales effort has been catapulted to the next level I will keep you abreast of our successes in sales to various Universities that we are targeting Thank you Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo Data Storage Trading Cell

Thank youDear Jeff I was saddened to hear that you have decided to leave Enron I couldnt help but reflect back to this past April when I had the opportunity to travel with you for two consecutive days to Harvard and NYU and remember the pearls of wisdom that you imparted about business on our flight I will remember them always I would like to wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors and thank you for a great two years that I have had with the AA program here at Enron I will find it a great honor if you feel that I can be of any assistance in the future Thank you Sincerely Shalesh Ganjoo Associate Ext
